channel.title: Stink or regs?
channel.description:
so i have a pretty shit supply of bad weed, it's quite shit. Now i'm going to a festival in about a month, and I have about £100+ to spend on a bit of ganja.
I can either get a half ounce of shit quality and be done with it or spend more for a few grams of absolute high grade (og, ak47, some more: a gram of each). I want to be stoned for all the 3 days and nights, what do?

item.title: Stink or regs?
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

Getting a quarter (7g) to half with a friend. then next week we’re buying another quarter to split and some proper potent pure pollen hash.

EDIT: Got the quarter and a gram of hash! Testing the hash soon, I’ll let you know

item.title: Stink or regs?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

Quality vs Quantity is probably one of the biggest debates in the cannabis world. Personally, I always choose quality over quantity. The argument most people have for quantity is that you have more than enough to smoke so much that you have the same THC levels as the dank stuff. However, it doesn’t work that way, and you end up filling your body with tons of other cannabinoids such as CBD which is usually found in smaller amounts in dank buds (assuming as most dank is, it is primarily sativa). So instead, you just get super stoned and fall asleep instead of having the profound and fun high of a quality strain.

Personally it varies, but my favorite part of quality bud is the lack of a bad “burnout” id get from the normal weed.

Keep in mind I live in Canada where our “regs” are usually comparable to low-grade dank in the USA, Canadian exos are the boss.

I drop $200 an ounce on my exos, where as I could spend $130 on regs. Its worth every penny.

Read full topic

item.title: Stink or regs?
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:8, topic:402328”]Them being chavvvy makes no difference to size of deal?? Shit dealers make difference to size of deal.

Where abouts in the UK you at?[/quote]
South.

Ollie:

dont buy from chavs lol, i get my bud from a 42 year old woman hippie

My friends mum (whos like 70 lol) gets it from an old woman, they do pretty decent stuff… I wanna find someone decent like this but it’s prooving far too hard. I once had a hippy friend a couple years older me but he’s turning into a tosser now. Mates mum wont get me and my other friend any because she dont know us that well, but hopefully after this festival (shes coming too lol) she’ll get to know us more and will smoke with us etc.

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:10, topic:402328”][quote author=chri5 link=topic=499383.msg3652184#msg3652184 date=1309809077]
How much ww should I get to last 3 days/evenings of constant baking?

How much would get me high/baked at a time? I may get some beforehand
[/quote]
depending on how much you smoke I’d say get a quarter-half o[/quote]
My original plan was to get a half oz of poo and take that, I’ll probably take a quarter or more of WW

item.title: Stink or regs?
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

Mr.Chris:

find a better dealer man - decent weed is so easy to find…

I beg to differ about that, my situation is terrible: EVERYONE that’s under the age of 25 in this area is an absolute Chav which makes it hard to get decent deals. I wonder if it’s the same throughout the UK :(.

I think i’ll get 2.5 soon and see what it’s like, then get a half oz depending on price.

Read full topic

item.title: Stink or regs?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Put it this way, I went to a festival 2 years back, and my and my mate went halves on a faaaat ounce (we even picked a half oz up for someone else and dipped the shit out of it (and that was still big)). Smoked all day/night Fri and Sat and by Sun we were down to last couple of 8ths.

No one apart from you knows how much you can smoke up, so I’m not sure why you’re really asking. Get an ounce (find a better dealer man - decent weed is so easy to find…) and that should keep you pretty baked for a weekend imo…

Read full topic

item.title: Stink or regs?
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“chri5, post:3, topic:402328”][quote author=sppt link=topic=499383.msg3652140#msg3652140 date=1309807460]
Well, how much are you able to get of the high grade stuff?
And, are you gonna share with friends?
If the answer is no, I’d get high grade stuff if I were you.
[/quote]
£15 /gram of AK 47, £25 /2.5g White Widow, £25 /1.5g of OG kush(cheaper if bulk). terribly expensive compared to poo grade.[/quote]
I’d get the white widow. Its a very good strain and is the cheapest of the three and will keep you blasted for 3 days.
